name: Beetle Royale
description:
A battle royale split-screen multiplayer game, where players ride beetles into an epic miniature-sized battle and eliminate others, all for fame and glory in the Beetle-Knight Hall of Fame!

Made by

Nils Qvis - 2D Art and Animation
Toni Sariola - Lead Programmer
Ivar Kerajarvi - Programmer, Sound Designer
Petter Nissinen - Background Art
Brandon Startz - UI Designer
Mai Trosterud - UX
